entry.text:
[B6A67B]For the period of subscription you will get:[-]
܀ Double in-game shop point income. ܀ Special stand out shade of green name color in-game. ܀ Special Discord role and access to the supporter only channels. ܀ Ability to set second home location (/sethome2 and /home2). ܀ Access to a /bag chat command that will take you back to your death location. ܀ Access to /donor Safe Zone with 5 traders and 2 workbenches. ܀ You are allowed to have 9 land claims placed per map. ܀ Permanent player buffs
[B6A67B]Player Buffs - [-][3f704d]Tier 1[-]
- 5% Walk/Run speed increase - 5% Stamina regen increase - 10% Noise reduction - 5% loot bonus
